channel.title: Client wont load [READ AND YOU'LL KNOW WHAT I MEAN]
channel.description:
Well, it was all fine on my server... Then, i come back later,run server, open client,when i put in my user and pass,and login it logs in then the screen is black...
Here is pic:
This image has been resized. Click this bar to view the full image. The original image is sized 781x539.
And it stays like that for a bit then says
connection lost - attempting to reestablish
Can someone help me out :o

item.title: Client wont load [READ AND YOU'LL KNOW WHAT I MEAN]
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

it could be if you edited a shop, but failed that could happen. happens to me a lot lol try to fix your shops or something

other then that gl

Read full topic

item.title: Client wont load [READ AND YOU'LL KNOW WHAT I MEAN]
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

you may have missed typed somthing in the .cfg files (Most common .dat errors is item.cfg or shops.cfg) check it and if there’s an error then re do it and it should work

That’s all I can say,
